S032W.Q8. DO YOU THINK YOU MIGHT WANT TO STAY IN THE ARMY AFTER THE WA?  1. YES, I WOULD WANT TO VERY MUCH 2. YES, I MIGHT WANT TO, BUT I'M NOT SURE 3. NO, I DON'T THINK I WOULD WANT TO 4. NO, I WOULD NOT WANT TO AT ALL 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S032W.Q9. AFTER THE WAR DO YOU THINK YOU WOULD LIKE TO COME BACK TO YOUR OLD OUTFIT FOR TWO WEEKS OF ARMY TRAINING EVERY YEA?  1. YES, I WOULD WANT TO VERY MUCH 2. YES, I MIGHT WANT TO, BUT I'M NOT SURE 3. NO, I DON'T THINK I WOULD WANT TO 4. NO, I WOULD NOT WANT TO AT ALL 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S032W.Q29. HOW MUCH LONGER DO YOU THINK THIS WAR WILL LAS?  01. LESS THAN A YEAR, "1943" 02. ONE YEAR 03. OVER ONE TO LESS THAN TWO YEARS, "1944" 04. TWO YEARS 05. OVER TWO TO LESS THAN THREE YEARS, "1945" 06. THREE YEARS 07. OVER THREE YEARS 08. INDEFINITE ANSWER INDICATING A SHORT TIME (NOT LONG) 09. INDEFINITE ANSWER INDICATING A LONG TIME (SEVERAL YEARS YET) 10. INDEFINITE ANSWER WITH NO INDICATION OF TIME (WILL LAST UNTIL WE STOP IT) 11. DON'T KNOW, UNDECIDED 12. NO ANSWER 00. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S032W.Q30. IF IT WERE UP TO YOU, WHAT KIND OF OUTFIT WOULD YOU RATHER BE I?  1. IN A COMBAT OUTFIT OVERSEAS 2. IN A NON-COMBAT OUTFIT OVERSEAS 3. IN AN OUTFIT THAT WILL STAY IN THE UNITED STATES 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S032W.Q31. IF YOUR OUTFIT WENT OVERSEAS, WOULD YOU RATHER HAVE AN ACTUAL FIGHTING JOB OR HAVE SOME OTHER JO?  1. I WOULD RATHER HAVE AN ACTUAL FIGHTING JOB 2. I WOULD RATHER HAVE SOME OTHER JOB 3. UNDECIDED 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S032W.Q32. IF IT WERE UP TO YOU TO CHOOSE, DO YOU THINK YOU COULD DO MORE FOR YOUR COUNTRY AS A SOLDIER OR AS A WORKER IN A WAR JO?  1. AS A SOLDIER 2. AS A WAR WORKER 3. UNDECIDED 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S032W.Q33. DO YOU THINK THERE WILL BE ANOTHER WAR IN THE NEXT 25 YEARS OR S?  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S032W.Q34. IF YOU THINK THERE WILL BE ANOTHER WAR, WHO DO YOU THINK WILL BE FIGHTING WHO?  01. CIVIL WAR OR RACE WAR IN U.S. 02. DARK AGAINST LIGHT RACES ON AN INTERNATIONAL SCALE 03. RUSSIA WITH DARK ALLIES ONLY (CHINA, JAPAN, AFRICA, INDIA) AGAINST ANY OTHER NATION OR COMBINATION OF NATIONS 04. RUSSIA WITH ONE OR MORE OF AXIS NATIONS BESIDES JAPAN AGAINST ANY OTHER NATION OR COMBINATION OF NATIONS 05. RUSSIA WITH ONE OR MORE OF ALLIED NATIONS BESIDES CHINA AGAINST ANY OTHER NATION OR COMBINATION OF NATIONS 06. RUSSIA WITH NO ALLIES AGAINST ANY OTHER NATION OR COMBINATION OF NATIONS 07. COMMUNISM VS. CAPITALISM 08. WORLD WAR III - ANY LINE UP LIKE WORLD WARS I AND II (SAME SET UP AS LAST TIME, THOSE DEFEATED NOW FIGHTING THE WINNERS) 09. RUSSIA IS INVOLVED, BUT EVERYTHING ELSE IS INDETERMINABLE 10. RACE WAR BUT WHETHER U.S. OR INTERNATIONAL NOT STATED 11. UNCLASSIFIABLE COMBINATIONS 12. NO ANSWER, DON'T KNOW, INAPPLICABLE

S032W.Q35. UP TO NOW, HAS THE WAR MADE THINGS BETTER OR WORSE FOR YOUR FAMILY AND FRIENDS BACK HOME (SUCH THINGS AS JOBS, PAY, AND LIVING CONDITIONS)*  1. THINGS ARE A LOT BETTER 2. THINGS ARE A LITTLE BETTER, BUT NOT MUCH 3. I DON'T SEE ANY DIFFERENCE 4. THINGS ARE A LITTLE WORSE 5. THINGS ARE A LOT WORSE 6. DON'T KNOW 0. NO ANSWER

S032W.Q57A. (DO YOU THINK THAT AFTER THE WAR NEGROES IN THIS COUNTRY WILL HAVE MORE RIGHTS AND PRIVILEGES OR LESS RIGHTS AND PRIVILEGES THAN THEY HAD BEFORE THE WA?) WH?  01. MORE AND WAR AIMS ANSWER (THAT'S WHAT WE'RE FIGHTING FOR, WAR IS BEING FOUGHT FOR HUMAN RIGHTS) 02. MORE AND IDEALISTIC, DEMOCRATIC ANSWER (ALL MEN ARE CREATED FREE AND EQUAL) 03. MORE AS A REWARD FOR THEIR PART IN THE WAR (THEY WILL BE RECOGNIZED AS HAVING MATERIALLY AIDED WAR, THEY WILL ASK FOR THEM BECAUSE THEY FOUGHT IN THE WAR) 04. MORE AND AN HISTORICAL ANSWER (THEY'RE BETTERING THEMSELVES NOW, THEY'RE TAKING OVER JOBS WHITE MEN HAVE LEFT) 05. MORE AND CRITICISMS OF SOUTHERN POLICY TOWARD NEGROES 06. MORE AND STATEMENTS OF KINDS OF RIGHTS NEGROES ARE ENTITLED TO (THEY SHOULD GET BETTER HOUSING, SHOULD BE ABLE TO SIT ANYWHERE) 07. MORE BECAUSE NEGRO WILL BE MORE MILITANT (THE NEGRO IS WAKING UP, THEY WILL DEMAND MORE RIGHTS) 08. MORE QUALIFIED BY WHICH PART OF NEGRO GROUP SHOULD GET THEM OR SETTING LIMIT TO AMOUNT 09. MORE BUT REMARKS CRITICAL OF GIVING NEGROES MORE RIGHTS (THE ARMY IS RUINING THEM, THEY'RE GETTING OUT OF THEIR PLACE) 10. MORE AND BELIEF THAT BETTER UNDERSTANDING WILL COME THROUGH RACIAL CONTACTS 11. MORE AND SOME OTHER COMMENT 12. MORE AND NO COMMENT 13. LESS, WITH OR WITHOUT COMMENT 14. ABOUT THE SAME AND COMMENT IMPLYING THEY NOW HAVE SAME RIGHTS AS WHITES (IN SOME STATES THEY HAVE EQUAL RIGHTS ALREADY, ONE MAN IS AS GOOD AS ANOTHER) 15. ABOUT THE SAME BECAUSE NEGROES CAN'T BE TRUSTED WITH MORE RIGHTS (THEY'LL GET OUT OF CONTROL, THEY TAKE ADVANTAGE OF WHAT THEY HAVE NOW) 16. ABOUT THE SAME BECAUSE OF APPROVAL OF OR DESIRE FOR STATUS QUO (WE GET ALONG FINE WITH THE NEGRO, WHY CHANGE, THEY ARE STILL NEGROES, THEY SHOULD BE SEGREGATED) 17. ABOUT THE SAME BECAUSE CHANGES COME GRADUALLY, NOT OVERNIGHT 18. ABOUT THE SAME AND WAR HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH IT ATTITUDE (THEY'RE NOT FIGHTING ABOUT THAT, THIS WAR HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH THE RIGHTS OF WHITE AND COLORED) 19. ABOUT THE SAME AND AN HISTORICAL ANSWER 20. ABOUT THE SAME BECAUSE THEY'RE DOING NO MORE OR ARE NO BETTER THAN ANYONE ELSE (WHY GAIN AT WHITE'S EXPENSE) 21. ABOUT THE SAME AND THEY SHOULD BE EQUAL TO WHITES 22. ABOUT THE SAME AND SOME OTHER COMMENT 23. ABOUT THE SAME AND NO COMMENT; UNDECIDED WITH OR WITHOUT COMMENT; NO ANSWER 00. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S032W.Q60A. (DO YOU THINK IT IS A GOOD IDEA OR A POOR IDEA FOR WHITE AND NEGRO SOLDIERS TO HAVE SEPARATE PX'S IN ARMY CAMP?) WRITE ANY COMMENTS HERE:  01. IT'S A GOOD IDEA OUT OF DEFERENCE TO SOUTHERN CUSTOMS OR DEFERENCE TO THE EXISTENCE OF PREJUDICE (IT'S O.K. FOR SOUTH, BUT NOT FOR NORTH, NOT WHERE THIS CAMP IS LOCATED) 02. IT'S A GOOD IDEA BECAUSE INTERMINGLING WOULD LEAD TO VIOLENCE, FIGHTS, TROUBLE (THEY COULDN'T GET ALONG, THEY DON'T MIX WELL) 03. IT'S A GOOD IDEA BECAUSE NEGROES THEMSELVES LIKE IT BETTER THAT WAY (NEGROES FEEL UNCOMFORTABLE WITH WHITES, NEGROES FEEL MORE AT HOME WITH OWN RACE) 04. IT'S A GOOD IDEA BECAUSE WHITES DISLIKE OR ARE UNWILLING TO ASSOCIATE WITH NEGROES (DON'T WANT WHITE WOMEN ASSOCIATING WITH NEGROES, WE FEEL BETTER WITHOUT THEM AROUND) 05. IT'S A GOOD IDEA BECAUSE NEGROES ARE INFERIOR TO WHITES (THEY ARE NOT AS GOOD AS WHITES, THEY SHOULD NOT BE CLASSED WITH WHITES) 06. IT'S A GOOD IDEA BECAUSE SEPARATION IS RIGHT IN PRINCIPLE (RACES SHOULD BE KEPT SEPARATE, THE NEGRO IS O.K. ON HIS SIDE OF THE FENCE) 07. IT'S A GOOD IDEA BECAUSE I PERSONALLY DISLIKE OR OBJECT TO NEGROES (I JUST DON'T LIKE NEGROES, I DON'T WANT TO LIVE WITH NEGROES) 08. IT'S A GOOD IDEA AND CRITICISMS OF NEGROES (THEY SMELL BAD, THEY CARRY DISEASES) 09. IT'S A GOOD IDEA BECAUSE BOTH WHITES AND NEGROES PREFER IT THAT WAY 10. IT'S A GOOD IDEA AND SOME OTHER COMMENT 11. IT'S A GOOD IDEA AND NO COMMENT 12. UNDECIDED WITH OR WITHOUT COMMENT; IT'S A POOR IDEA, WITH OR WITHOUT COMMENT; NO ANSWER TO Q.60. 00. NO CODE OR NO DATA
